#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define mod 215372682525
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    ll sum,a,d,n,x,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>d>>n>>x;
        ll b[n+1];
        b[0]=1;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            b[i] = (x*b[i-1])%mod;
        }
        sum=0;
        ll temp=0;
        for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
        {
            sum = (sum + a*b[n-i])%mod;
            temp = (temp + i*b[n-i])%mod;
        }
        sum = (sum + d*temp)%mod;
        printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
